short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant, personalized AI assistance on any website with AI ON THE GO, powered by ChatGPT. Streamline your workflow today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Get hours worth of work done in seconds with AI ON THE GO! 🚀

AI ON THE GO is the ultimate ChatGPT-enabled app and Chrome extension that provides AI-powered assistance on almost any website. With this tool, you can seamlessly integrate AI into your browsing experience and access its features without interrupting your workflow.

Effortlessly rephrase, summarize, translate, explain, or reply to text on any website without the need for copy-pasting with AI ON THE GO.

Guess what? You don't even need a ChatGPT (OpenAI) Plus account to use our extension anymore! This means you can enjoy the benefits without paying or having an OpenAI account. 

aionthego.net is a complimentary Chrome extension designed to supercharge your productivity by harnessing the power of ChatGPT by OpenAI and making it readily available at your fingertips! 🌟

We recognize the importance of your time and your dedication to productivity. That's why we've crafted this nifty tool to assist you in writing, rephrasing, summarizing, translating, explaining, or replying to any text on any website, eliminating the need for copy-pasting.

Think of it as your personal AI assistant, but working seamlessly across the entire web. 🪄

Key features:

🚀 1) Quickest access to ChatGPT and GPT-4

✔️ Just click on the icon present at the right button corner of your computer screen while browsing any website.
✔️ The Chat sidebar will appear on the right.

📝 2) Effortlessly rewrite, summarize, translate, or explain with just one click selected text

✔️ Choose any text on any website
✔️ Click on the icon and all your selected text is already in the input field. (You can edit this text as you like)
✔️ In the prompt field just give it a command to rewrite, summarize, explain or anything that you can think of.
✔️ Click “GO” and see it transforming your text.

💬 4) Generate replies for selected text

✔️ Write or reply to email
✔️ Write or respond to social media posts like Facebook, twitter, LinkedIn, Reddit, Quora etc.
✔️ Respond to chats on WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram etc

🏆 How is AI ON THE GO different from other extensions?

✔️ Choose a desired output language from a list of 14 Languages.
✔️ Chose a desired output tone from Casual, Humorous, Informative, Professional, Convincing, Inspirational, and Critical)
✔️ Choose the output sentences length (Small, Normal, or Long)

💯 Why choose aionthego.net?

✔️ Works seamlessly everywhere - ANY text on ANY website.
✔️ Use the chat feature to ask follow-up questions or refine results in the sidebar.
✔️ Supports all languages.
✔️ Completely free to use. (Subject to the available plans)
✔️ 100% privacy-friendly.

❓How to get started

Follow these simple steps to begin:

✔️ Click the "Add to Chrome" button at the upper right corner.
✔️ Refresh all tabs - Refresh all websites to activate the extension on them.
✔️ Create your AI ON THE GO ACCOUNT and Login.
✔️ Select any text, and click the icon at the right bottom corner of your browser screen.

🚀 Turbocharge your productivity with ChatGPT by 10X! 🎉💯


🤖 Personalized Assistance:

✔️ ChatGPT uses reinforcement learning to improve its responses over time, allowing for personalized and relevant assistance. This means that the more you use AI ON THE GO, the more it understands your needs and preferences.

🌍 Multilingual Support:

✔️ AI ON THE GO supports multiple languages, making it accessible to users around the world. Whether you're browsing in English, Spanish, French, or any other language, AI ON THE GO has got you covered.

👨‍💻 Code Support:

✔️ ChatGPT is proficient with STEM disciplines, making it a useful tool for coding and technical assistance. With AI ON THE GO, you can get AI-powered coding help and technical support, making your work much easier and more efficient.

💡 Content Generation:

✔️ AI ON THE GO can help generate various types of content, including articles, social media posts, and product descriptions. With this tool, you can save time and generate high-quality content in seconds.

📈 Revolutionize Your Workflow:

✔️ With AI ON THE GO, you can revolutionize your workflow and get hours worth of work done in seconds. Whether you're a content creator, a coder, or a business owner, this tool will help you save time and streamline your work.

📧 Questions, suggestions, or feedback?

Don't hesitate to drop us a line at info@aionthego.net
